Whether you're whipping up fresh purees or opting for store-bought favorites like apple sauce and yogurt, the Squeeze Station has got you covered for all your baby's snacking and mealtime needs. Perfect for introducing solids or storing delicious purees, this system allows you to fill up to three reusable pouches simultaneously, ideal for batch preparation. These pouches, designed for both fridge and freezer storage, ensure that a healthy, homemade option is always within reach. Follow four simple steps to prepare a range of food pouches tailored to your baby's taste, and enjoy the top rack dishwasher-safe tubes for effortless cleanup. Make meal prep a joy with the Infantino Squeeze Station, your go-to for ready-to-go baby meals right from your kitchen.

short_description: Unique system to make delicious baby food: 3 cooking trays with steam juicer and a 3-speed blender, easily programmable for various cook times. This baby food maker and steamer helps preserve nutrients, vitamins and natural food flavors.

Easy to clean and use: the duo meal station XL is easy to clean as its components can be detached and are dishwasher safe. The intuitive LCD control panel and audio alerts make operating this food Maker a breeze.

Safe for YOUR baby and your family: the award winning duo meal station XL has been rigorously put to test and approved by moms and dads across the country as well as nutritionists. It is certified BPA, Lead and phthalate free.

6-in-1 design saves SPACE: all-in-one design to cook, blend, warm and defrost baby food, plus use as a bottle warmer and sterilizer. This all-in-one food prep machine reduces countertop clutter and is a baby registry must-have.
product_description: Cooking ingredients separately is the secret to healthy and tasty cuisine. With Duo meal station XL, each ingredient is steam-cooked individually for optimal taste and nutrition: All you need to do is start cooking the foods that need to cook for the longest time in the 1st basket, then add the other ingredients to the 2nd basket a few minutes before the end of the cycle. A 3rd steaming basket can be added for additional ingredients or combined with the other trays to increase capacity. Accordingly, each ingredient is cooked the right amount of time and baby benefits from all the vitamins and enjoys the best flavors. Biggest capacity on the market with a capacity of 12 cups to cook for several days or for the whole family. Duo meal station is saving you time in the kitchen and giving you more time to hang out with your little ones. The only baby food processor with 6 different essential functions: steam, blend, sterilizes (up to 3 full size BOTTLES), defrosts, reheats and warms bottles. All the functions are easily managed thanks to its LCD screen. Since it sterilizes and warms bottles Duo meal station XL can be used from birth, and this makes it a baby registry must-have. A practical cooking spatula is included for added convenience.
